name: Dr. Pig's Daily Constitutionals
description:
Dr. Pig knows it's healthy to keep active! But the neighborhood sure is in a ruckus today!

Navigate the angry rocks while completing your loop before you need to take your nap (it's important to maintain a healthy sleep schedule!)

The game's difficulty (# of enemies, # of obstacles, and rock speed) increases as you complete more loops - and the dialog changes each time too! 

So take some time, relax to the music, and just enjoy slowing down for a bit!

Controls: 

WASD/Arrow Keys -  Move

Left Shift  - Interact (Talk to creatures, check objects, go to sleep)

Spacebar - Dash

Esc - Menu
